channel.title: The Ember Electron Sql Demonstration on Ian Teda
channel.description: Recent content in The Ember Electron Sql Demonstration on Ian Teda

item.title: Ember Electron SQL - The Initialisation
item.description: Scaffolding Ember We are going to start by scaffold out a new Ember app in the terminal. Open up your favourite terminal and cd into your workspace. Then run the new Ember application command: cd ~\Workspaces\ ember new EmberElectronSQL You should see Ember create a bunch of files and then fetch some npm packages in your terminal window.
